channel.title: C. Seth Lester, ASA
channel.description: Recent content on C. Seth Lester, ASA

item.title: Visual Résumé
item.description: The code used to build this visual résumé was was created in R Markdown and is available at my Github site. If you would prefer a more traditional résumé (typeset in LaTeX), then I have that in Adobe PDF format as well. Work Experience Education and Professional Designations Technical Competencies References

item.title: The Actuarial Standards of Practice: A brief visual analysis
item.description: This content was generated using a R Markdown Notebook. The code / .RMD file used to build this page, as well as additional documentation and resources, are all located on my personal GitHub page. A slightly revised version of this content was posted on LinkedIn. What do actuaries do? I volunteered (with some eagerness) to teach the R training sessions to the bright and talented “virtual” actuarial intern cohorts we have at Cigna this year in our Philadelphia office, and I wanted to kick off the presentation with a showcase of the flexibility and power that the R language and RStudio IDE can bring to a project, all while providing my spin on the so-called million-dollar question: “What do actuaries do?
